title: PeoplePod
description: Personal CRM built with the MongDB, Express, React, Node. Client and API are separate repos.

title: Travel Site
description: React Travel SPA built with custom CSS3 and deployed to Github Pages. Fully responsive.

title: Portfolio Site
description: Portfolio site built with React, Gatsby, Netlify, and Framer Motion.

title: Film Findr v2
description: An updated version of Film Findr v1 that uses Redux and Styled Components.

title: Film Findr v1
description: A React web app that allows users to search for movies. It uses the TMDB API.

title: Fun Food Friends
description: A React web app that leverages Firebase. It allows users to log what they will bring to a potluck.

title: Book List
description: A simple app built with JavaScript that allows users to keep track of books they're interested in.
